title: Tender for Supply Auto - Disable Syringes 0.05ml, Disposable, for BCG Needle: 27G x 12mm (1,500,000 Nos), Auto - Disable Syringes 0.5ml Needle: 23G x 25mm (12,000,000 Nos), Auto - Disable Syringes for Reconstitution of BCG, 2ml Needle: 21G x 40MM (150,000 Nos), Auto - Disable Syringes 5ml for Re-constitutions Needle: 21G x 40mm (1,200,000 Nos)
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award all items of this tender to the lowest responsive bidder as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
